title: Scripter (No in game video) But Solid Evidence
body:
Posting on behalf of a friend who he presumes the Jinx to be a Scripter.  Wanting to get more information before turning to the boards, I looked into Jinx's (the scripter) recent matches as well as his/her LOLKing.  So I am asking for some ruling against Jinx or for a rioter to keep tabs on this person to see if any 3rd party program is in play to keep these types of Rule Breakers out of this game that I love.  Images will be linked below.  I also would like to point out in the LOLKing Climb image the incredibly steep increase in ranking from right when Jinx reached Gold.

LOLKing Climb from 16/11/2013 to 01/03/2016
http://puu.sh/nqItu/4549382454.png

Match History of 01/03/2016
http://puu.sh/nqMvV/ab13007e1e.jpg

Damage In Game
http://puu.sh/nqIib/cfd3ef4c10.jpg

This game was a Pre-Made 5 and after checking the other 4 teammates in Jinx's team they are all a Pre-Made 5.  If Riot chooses to keep an eye out for the others players in the team with Jinx, that would be amazing.  Also I am a Platinum 4 player nearly Platinum 3 and would really hate to get someone like Jinx in my game.  So I am also doing this for myself and future people who have to vs this Jinx.

EDIT:  If nothing is wrong then I have no problem, just want to absolutely make sure.  Also they said that in team fights the Jinx was dodging EVERYTHING.  Against a CC heavy team such as this one, I get a little suspicious that they didn't hit anything against this Jinx.

Thank You for your time and hope that Justice will be served.

replies.body:
>Against a CC heavy team such as this one, I get a little suspicious that they didn't hit anything against this Jinx.

She has 5 death's, a Scimitar, A janna (the peel queen), Lulu (the utility mid laner for protect the carry comps), Shen (ult shield and taunt's) And to top it off a Nautilus (the single target lock down for the team)

They clearly hit things to get her to 5 deaths, but against a team like this, it doesn't matter what you hit, it's not helping.

Hi, could you please remove the names as it is [against the rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) to name and shame. ♥

While it is a little suspicious, it is completely possible that they legitimately got good. I have a friend who went from silver to diamond during preseason/before mid-feb this year, as well as a friend who went from bronze 5 to diamond in half a year.

It's also possible that within his 5man premade, his team works really really well together with all the communication and co-ordination needed to get those kinds of scores.

If you are suspicious of a player that may be scripting, be sure to report them in the post game lobby.

Oh they did but it's just to make sure.  If nothings wrong then I have no problem with it.  But if he/she is then I would like him/her banned.  Just don't really want to take risks that's all.  But sure I will remove the names.  However I can not from the images sorry.
If you don't the entire thing will get taken down, just put black over all the names, because you're most likely just wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=SmashBro,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=7i82PylQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-01T09:13:51.115+0000)
>
> Oh they did but it's just to make sure.  If nothings wrong then I have no problem with it.  But if he/she is then I would like him/her banned.  Just don't really want to take risks that's all.  But sure I will remove the names.  However I can not from the images sorry.

Delete the images and then re-upload them with little MS paint bars covering them

Scripter?

It's clearly a booster team IF ANYTHING.

It's protect the ADC, and the ADC is either really good and this is all because of dynamic queue (remeber dynamic queue is a new thing, he and his friends may have actually known how to play and couldn't get out due to teams not syncing with their sort of playstyle), or it's a booster team and they are just boosting the account's.

EDIT: Just looked at the stats from past seasons for the account, it's most likely the same guy, so this post may as well be removed.
It does look mighty sus, that climb is quite fast. Riot usally keeps an eye on climbs like that, but it doesn't hurt to report them in.

If you knew more about the scene you might ask the guy if he is a pro player on a smurf. Another thing you could do is record all of their future games and double check with your friend.

[Ever heard of this guy?](https://twitter.com/AvantGaming/status/700085818958872576)

Click the link, not many players get a pentakill on debut.

dude that graph shows months....read the actual X axis references (the horizontal line) (the one that is flat like the ground you stand on) its from november 2013 to march 2016, the scale is that every point on the X axis (flat like the ground line) goes by every 2 months. how could you possibly just think "hurrdurr november 13th 2015, then, oh jan? no my names not jan, mar? more like marDI GRAS HURRHURRHURR, dis graf weird but i yooz it ppl not no difrents lyk me i say wot me want" hopefully you're learning graphs this year, or maybe it'll be year 9
he could of got a coach
